overview: Someday there'll be a 12-step program for everything ... even facesitting.  And if you're Kelly O'Dell, that day is now. Join director Jim Enright on an obsessive-compulsive excursion into facesitting where you "do it" until you get it. Unless you're the viewer, in which case you never quite get over it. Now watch this. Then sit on a happy face!
title: Face Sitter
